Kung Fu Panda.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery.
Today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
Your mind is like this water.
If you only do what you can do, you will never be more.
There is no charge for awesomeness.
One often meets his destiny on the road he avoids it.
You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
There is always something more to learn.

Kung Fu Panda 2.quote: You gotta let go of the past.
The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
Your story may not have such a happy beginning.
You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
Inner peace comes from accepting your past.

Kung Fu Panda 3.quote: The more you take, the less you have.
It was never my destiny to stop you.
Chi is a part of you.
I am not a big fat panda. I am THE big fat panda!
You have to let go of who you were.

Kung Fu Panda 4.quote: Maybe Oogway was right about you.
You are not as useless as you look.
Change is part of the journey.
It is time to become who you are meant to be.
